data.title: Lead Tracker
data.description: This project was inspired by a situation I noticed at work: How do our sales representatives keep track of their leads. The user can create, read, update and destroy leads. Additionally, there is authentication, with a user being able to create an account and login. This is built with Rails api, for the backend, React running the frontend and Redux handling state management. I utilized the react-chartjs-2 api to most efficiently display the user's data.
